title: Flag of Montenegro
cardDescription: The flag of Montenegro is a red field surrounded by a golden border; charged with the Coat of Arms at the center.
description: The flag of Montenegro is a red field surrounded by a golden border; charged with the Coat of Arms at the center. The coat of arms in the flag occupies 2/3 of its height. The width of the golden border is 1/20 the width of the hoist side.

content.content: If gold color is not available to you, try to choose a yarn closer to light brown than yellow. Mustard yellow might be a good shade. Just don't use a color that's too bright.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.
